text:
Hi everyone! I'm new to HubSpot CMS and I have a SEO issue I can't fix. When I audited a website, I got several hreflang issues (it's a multilingual site): "More than one page for same language in hreflang" and "More than one page for same language in hreflang". 
These issues are only on index pages like "/blog/". 
Do you have any clues on how I can fix this??? 
Thank you very much in advance!!!
